title: Large Scale CTR Prediction – Lessons Learned
dc:creator: Florian Hartl
description:
PyData happened in San Francisco two weeks ago and I’m happy to say that I was fortunate enough to be one of the speakers at this fine event. It was three exciting days of meeting interesting people and listening to insightful tutorials and presentations. Big shout out to the organizers who put the conference together on a voluntary basis. Videos of all the talks can be found here. As already mentioned, I had the opportunity to represent Yelp, speaking about: “Large Scale CTR Prediction – Lessons Learned”. Here’s the video with a brief description of the covered content below: “Starting with a basic…
